DiscoveryApiKey.description: Use key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header. Details on obtaining the key can be found at https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/marketplacecatalog/resourcemanager/create-api-key?view=rest-marketplacecatalog-resourcemanager-2023-01-01-preview
DiscoveryApiKey.name: X-API-Key

get.description: Retrieves a single product by ID from the marketplace catalog.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Retrieves a list of products available in the marketplace catalog.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Retrieves a list of SKUs available in the marketplace catalog.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

Artifact.description: Plan level resources and configuration files

artifactType.description:
The type of the artifact. Possible values include 
- `Template` - Contains link to the main ARM template
- `Fragment` - Contains link to the nested ARM template
- `Custom` - Custom artifact type
- `Metadata` - Metadata artifact type

Attribute.description: Represents a SKU attribute, which consists of a key and value. The attributes may differ across various services.

pricingAudience.description:
Supported pricing audiences. Possible values include 
- `DirectCommercial` - Available to commercial direct channel
- `PartnerCommercial` - Available to Cloud Solution Providers (CSP)

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

Image.description: Includes link to the product image

LinkProperties.description: Represents a link item read from the gallery item package

MarketStartPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

market.description: The market for which the starting price is calculated

MarketingMaterial.description: Includes links to the learning and marketing materials as configured by the publisher

value.description: The ProductSummary items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The SkuSummary items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PlanDetails.description: Returns a subset of Plan attributes

availabilities.description: List of availabilities for this plan

uiDefinitionUri.description: What blade to open when someone wants to create a marketplace item

artifacts.description: Files related to the marketplace item

isHidden.description: A value indicating whether the plan is hidden

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether plan has been stopped from selling

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether the plan is quantifiable

isHiddenPrivateOffer.description: A value indicating whether the plan is used as hidden private offer requiring a quote

skuAttributes.description: Set of SKU attributes (varies per sku type), where each attribute is represented by a pair of key (attribute name) and value(attribute value)

generation.description: The VM image generation (applicable to Virtual Machine products only)

altStackReference.description: Pointing to a planId which holds the alternative stack reference

relatedSkus.description: Pointing to a planId of plans that are related to this plan

PlanSkuRelation.description: Pointing to a related SKU object

PlanSummary.description: Returns a subset of Plan attributes

uniquePlanId.description: Unique plan Id which is prefixed by combining uniqueProductId and PlanId with no separator in between

displayName.description: Display name of the plan / sku

vmArchitectureType.description:
VM Architecture Type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values include 
- `X64Gen1` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation1
- `X64Gen2` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation2
- `Arm64` - The VM image architecture of the plan is Arm64

cspState.description:
Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. Possible values include 
- `OptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for any partner in the CSP Program
- `OptOut` - Plan configured CSP program opt-out
- `SelectiveOptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for specific partners in the CSP program ISV selects

hasProtectedArtifacts.description: Set to true if plan has artifacts that are to be hidden for non authenticated users

pricingTypes.description:
The pricing types for which this plan is designated. Possible values include 
- `Free` - Product has at least one plan that is free of charge
- `FreeTrial` - Product has at least one plan that is free trial
- `Byol` - Product has at least one plan that is bring your own license
- `Payg` - Product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go
- `Ri` - Product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model

vmSecuritytypes.description:
VM security type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values include 
- `None` - Default value
- `Trusted` - Trusted Launch security
- `Confidential` - Confidential security

planType.description:
The delivery method or deployment model. Possible values include 
- `None` - Default value
- `DevService` - Dev Service
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type
- `VirtualMachine` - Virtual Machine
- `AzureApplication` - Azure Application
- `Container` - Container
- `SaaS` - Software as a Service
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template
- `IotEdgeModules` - IoT Edge Module
- `ManagedServices` - Managed Service
- `ContainerApps` - Container App
- `VisualStudioExtension` - Visual Studio Extension
- `DynamicsOps` - Dynamics Operations
- `DynamicsCE` - Dynamics CE
- `DynamicsBC` - Dynamics Business Central
- `PowerBI` - Power BI
- `ConsultingServices` - Consulting Services
- `CosellOnly` - Co-sell Only
- `CoreVirtualMachine` - Core Virtual Machine
- `PowerBIVisuals` - Power BI Visuals
- `Office365` - Office 365
- `AADApps` - Azure Active Directory Applications
- `AzureServices` - Azure Services
- `AppService` - App Service
- `LogAnalytics` - Log Analytics
- `MicrosoftProduct` - Microsoft Product

displayRank.description: The order the plan is displayed in the 'Plans' table

isPrivate.description: Indication that the plan is accessible to restricted audience only

hasRi.description: Indication whether the SKU supports reservations

isPiRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

msrp.description: Manufacturer's suggested retail price for the item

linkedAddIns.description: List of linked Add Ins provided for the item

links.description: List of Links provided for the item

additionalProductProperties.description: Dictionary of additional properties provided for the item

hasStandardContractAmendments.description: A value indicating whether standard contract amendments are present

standardContractAmendmentsRevisionId.description: Standard contract amendments for the product

universalAmendmentUrl.description: The universal amendment link for an enterprise contract

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether sale of this item is stopped

legalTermsType.description:
Supported legal terms type. Possible values include 
- `None` - No specific legal terms
- `EA` - Microsoft Enterprise Agreement

mediumIconUri.description: URI to the medium product icon

largeIconUri.description: URI to the large product icon

wideIconUri.description: URI to the wide product icon

pricingDetailsUri.description: Pricing details uri of the product

isReseller.description: A value indicating whether microsoft is acting as a reseller

disableSendEmailOnPurchase.description: Indication to disable sending email on purchase

isCoreVm.description: Indicates if VM was originally CoreVirtualMachine

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

marketingMaterial.description: Includes links to the learning and marketing materials as configured by the publisher

productId.description: The unique id of the product

ProductSummary.description: Returns a subset of Product attributes

industryIds.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

azureBenefit.description:
Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit. For more details see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit. Possible values include 
- `Eligible` - The product is eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit
- `NotEligible` - The product is not eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit

badges.description:
Badge type. Possible values include 
- `PreferredSolution` - Preferred Solution badge
- `PowerBICertified` - Power BI Certified badge
- `AdditionalPurchaseRequirement` - Additional Purchase Requirement badge

publisherType.description:
A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product. Possible values include 
- `Microsoft` - Product is published by Microsoft (1st party product)
- `ThirdParty` - Product is published by Third Party Vendor

publishingStage.description:
Product publishing stage. Possible values include 
- `Preview` - Product is available to restricted audience
- `Public` - Product is publicly available in the Marketplace

productType.description:
The delivery method or deployment model. Possible values include 
- `None` - Default value
- `DevService` - Dev Service
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type
- `VirtualMachine` - Virtual Machine
- `AzureApplication` - Azure Application
- `Container` - Container
- `SaaS` - Software as a Service
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template
- `IotEdgeModules` - IoT Edge Module
- `ManagedServices` - Managed Service

- `Office365` - Office 365
- `AADApps` - Azure Active Directory Applications
- `AzureServices` - Azure Services
- `AppService` - App Service
- `LogAnalytics` - Log Analytics
- `MicrosoftProduct` - Microsoft Product

operatingSystems.description: Operating system info for this product

pricingTypes.description:
The pricing types for which this plan is designated. Possible values include 
- `Free` - Product has at least one plan that is free of charge
- `FreeTrial` - Product has at least one plan that is free trial
- `Byol` - Product has at least one plan that is bring your own license
- `Payg` - Product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go
- `Ri` - Product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model

smallIconUri.description: URI to the small product icon

cspLegalTermsUri.description: The legal terms of the product for the CSP

privacyPolicyUri.description: The privacy policy of the product

ratingBuckets.description:
Rating Bucket. Possible values include 
- `AboveOne` - Above one star rating
- `AboveTwo` - Above two stars rating
- `AboveThree` - Above three stars rating
- `AboveFour` - Above four stars rating

ratingCount.description: Total number of ratings for the offer

startingPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

supportedProducts.description: Maps to the list of compatible products

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Latest update date of the product

locations.description: List of locations which are available on the SKUs

serviceFamily.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

service.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

productId.description: The unique id of the product

hasRiPlans.description: Indication whether the product has plans with reservations

hasMarketplaceFootprint.description: Indication if product has a representation in the marketplace

PurchaseDurationDiscount.description: The percentage discount for 3rd party virtual machines software reservations

SkuProperties.description: The SKU properties, contains some of the attributes for faster OData filter

dataDiskType.description: The data disk type, such as 'Ssd'

productId.description: The unique id of the product

serviceFamily.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

service.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

publisherType.description:
A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product. Possible values include 
- `Microsoft` - Product is published by Microsoft (1st party product)
- `ThirdParty` - Product is published by Third Party Vendor

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Latest update date of the SKU

cspState.description:
Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. Possible values include 
- `OptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for any partner in the CSP Program
- `OptOut` - Plan configured CSP program opt-out
- `SelectiveOptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for specific partners in the CSP program ISV selects

hasRi.description: Indication whether the SKU supports reservations

StopSellInfo.description: Represents a model for stop sell related information

startDate.description: A value indicating when the sale of this item is going to be stopped

reason.description:
Reason for stopping to sell an item. Possible values include 
- `EndOfSupport` - End of support for the item
- `SecurityIssue` - Security issue with the item
- `Other` - Other reason

alternativeOfferId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative offer provided by the same publisher

alternativePlanId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative plan of the same offer

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

ExcludeSkuDetailsParameter.name: excludeSkuDetails
ExcludeSkuDetailsParameter.description: Indicates whether to exclude SKU details in the response. By default, excludeSkuDetails is set to FALSE.

HideKeysParameter.name: hideKeys
HideKeysParameter.description: This key is utilized to retrieve preview products and is generated within the Partner Center during the offer publishing process.

IncludeFutureAvailabilitiesParameter.name: includeFutureAvailabilities
IncludeFutureAvailabilitiesParameter.description: Indicates whether to include the product's plans/SKU availabilities with future dates in the response. By default, includeFutureAvailabilities is set to FALSE.

IncludeStopSoldPlansParameter.name: includeStopSoldPlans
IncludeStopSoldPlansParameter.description: Indicates whether to include in the response the product's plans/SKUs that are no longer available for purchase. By default, includeStopSoldPlans is set to FALSE.

LanguageParameter.name: language
LanguageParameter.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'. Default is "en"

ListingMarketParameter.name: market
ListingMarketParameter.description:
Product market value  (the response will include only products that can be sold in the specified market)
Possible values can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Example: 'US'

LocationsParameter.name: locations
LocationsParameter.description: Return products available in selected location. Enumeration of the Azure datacenter regions. See https://azure.microsoft.com/regions/

OdataFilterParameter.name: $filter
OdataFilterParameter.description:
Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition. Example: $filter=productType eq 'VirtualMachine'. Fields that can be filtered by are:
- `displayName`
- `productId`
- `popularity`
- `categoryIds`
- `industryIds`
- `publisherId`
- `uniqueProductId`
- `productType`
- `operatingSystems`
- `pricingTypes`
- `publisherDisplayName`
- `longSummary`
- `summary`
- `linkedAddinsTypes`
- `description`
- `supportedProducts`
- `applicableProducts`
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `plan.planId`
- `plan.displayName`
- `plan.cspState`
- `plan.altStackReference`
- `plan.stackType`
- `plan.categoryIds`
- `plan.hasProtectedArtifacts`
- `plan.pricingTypes`
- `plan.summary`
- `plan.description`
- `plan.skuId`
- `plan.displayRank`
- `plan.isPrivate`

OdataOrderByParameter.name: $orderBy
OdataOrderByParameter.description:
Ordering expression for the results using OData notation. Avoid using orderby unless essential as this may impact the latency of your request.  Example: $orderby=displayName desc.This API only supports ordering by a single field. Fields that can be ordered by are:
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `uniqueProductId`
- `productType`
- `displayName`
- `publisherId`

OdataSelectParameter.name: $select
OdataSelectParameter.description: Selects which properties to include in the results. Example: $select=displayName

PricingAudienceParameter.name: pricingAudience
PricingAudienceParameter.description: Can be 'DirectCommercial' or 'PartnerCommercial', 'DirectCommercial' is the default

SearchParameter.name: $search
SearchParameter.description: Optional search by display name, publisher display name, or keywords. Example $search=Microsoft

ServiceFamilyParameter.name: serviceFamily
ServiceFamilyParameter.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

ServiceParameter.name: service
ServiceParameter.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

SingleMarketParameter.name: market
SingleMarketParameter.description:
Product market value. The response will include plans/availabilities that can be sold in the specified market
Possible values can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Example: 'US'

SkuIdParameter.name: skuId
SkuIdParameter.description: Apply SKU ID filtering to the results and only return products that include SKUs matching the selected SKU ID.
